messages.subject: reality creation
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone... I am just popping in here to ask a quick question about something that happened months ago (hopefully on this list :) ) Please bear with me...
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone... I am just popping in here to ask a quick question
about something that happened months ago (hopefully on this list :) )
Please bear with me...

There was some discussion (unfortunately I don't even remember the
topic) and some scientific study or another was being used as
evidence... someone responded by saying that she thought we create
our own reality anyway and so the studies have no relevance to her
(please forgive my paraphrasing). If this person is reading this,
please e-mail me off-list.. I feel the same way and have a few
questions I would like to ask you (if you don't mind, that is :) )

Thanks for letting me interrupt!!
Tori
rainbowlovespirit@...
